title: Smallpeice Engineer
description: This was a two month volunteering project for Smallpeice Trust. The aim was to make a mobile-first app to aid 16-18 year olds with potential engineering careers.

title: Nature Connect
description: This project was a larger group project, focusing on creating a solution for users that want to reconnect to nature. This was a more complex project created over 2 weeks.

title: Cat Tree
description: A project focused on creating a react application within a 2 day time frame, using a CatAPI to create a cat shelter theme website to support the adoption of more cats.

title: Timeless Advisor
description: A fullstack group project, with a week deadline, focusing on creating a History game for secondary school students.

title: Draft Banking
description: A project focused on creating a banking app with sleek UI and implementing new techniques learned in React.

title: Beauty Begins
description: A project created focusing on the design for a makeup artist, focusing on clean UI and responsive design.
